thread.section_title: Ambrose Evans-Pritchard - Finance and business comments
thread.title: Greek banks down to €500m in cash reserves as economy crashes
thread.title_full: Greek banks down to €500m in cash reserves as economy crashes

author: Ambrose Evans-Pritchard
title: Greek banks down to €500m in cash reserves as economy crashes
text: Economics Greek banks down to €500m in cash reserves as economy crashes The daily allowance of cash from many ATM machines has already dropped from €60 to €50, purportedly because €20 notes are running out The vote was originally intended to secure a stronger negotiating mandate for a showdown with Europe, but it is rapidly turning into an 'in-or-out' decision on euro membership Photo: AFP By Ambrose Evans-Pritchard , in Athens 7:20PM BST 02 Jul 2015
